alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 2:26PM MST until February 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Santa Cruz River Valley/Altar Valley, Tucson Metro Area, Upper San Pedro River Valley, Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet, Upper Gila River Valley, Chiricahua Mountains and Dragoon and Mule and Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will produce areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities, especially across Cochise county.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
